author: lfl24
title: Splitter Beast
review:
Box/Instructions

Bag with cool artwork at the bottom

Parts

Good mixture of teal, orange, red and yellow and parts count goes above 100, but narrowly

Minifigures

Minifigures of Evo and Furno, but I don't like how Evo's comm device/pad on his left arm is designed because the gray piece that attaches onto it can't handle a 2 piece sized brickin length

The build

Fun, mostly simple and very durable

The completed model

Well built, splitting function takes awhile due to it taking awhile to detach the splitter beasts, mini figures are most stable and durable

Overall opinion

This is a great set in nearly every way, but the splitting function's mostly difficult to do consistently
